info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 12:42AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Litchfield County through 115 AM EDT... At 1242 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Winsted, or near Torrington, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Torrington, New Hartford, Norfolk, Winsted, New Hartford Center, Barkhamsted, Colebrook, Mooreville, North Colebrook, Riverton, Mill Brook, Beech Rock, Robertsville, Turkey Cobble, Goose Green, North Green, Pleasant Valley, Puddle Town, Newfield and Pine Meadow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
